entry.title: After about two-ish month Pilot Care (Herogotchi) is finished. I am equal parts exhausted and excited for it and I hope y‚Äôall have fun with it. Expect the post mortems to come after this. Also inputting a popular code on a specific screen will do a thing‚Ä¶
